helsmoortelutil.util

Class Math

  • java.lang.Object
    • helsmoortelutil.util.Math

  • public final class Math
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for regularly used math methods.

        public static double bodyMassIndex(double mass,
                                   double height)

        Parameters:
        mass - mass of the individual in kilograms
        height - height of the individual metres
        Returns:
        the BMI of the individual

      • bodyMassIndex

        public static double bodyMassIndex(double mass,
                                   double height,
                                   boolean isMetresAndKilograms)
        Returns the Body Mass Index (BMI) of an individual
        Parameters:
        mass - mass of the individual in kilograms or pounds
        height - height of the individual in metres or inches
        isMetresAndKilograms - boolean indicating if kilograms and metres are used (true) or pounds and inches (false)
        Returns:
        the BMI of the individual

      • isProportion

        public static boolean isProportion(int a,
                                   int b,
                                   int c,
                                   int d)
        Returns whether 2 fractures are in proportion.
        Parameters:
        a - counter of the first fracture
        b - denominator of the first fracture
        c - counter of the second fracture
        d - denominator of the second fracture
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if both fractures are in proportion (true when they are)

      • isProportion

        Parameters:

        b - denominator of the first fracture
        c - counter of the second fracture
        d - denominator of the second fracture
        Returns:
        boolean indicating if both fractures are in proportion (true when they are)
